feed.title: smart contracts -- possible use case? yes or no?

entry.title: smart contracts -- possible use case? yes or no?
entry.summary: In 2013, Neil Fincham expressed his desire to keep philosophy and tax evasion out of the mailing list he subscribed to for bitcoin development updates. Gavin Andresen, in response, agreed that such topics were off-topic for the list and suggested that the members focus solely on technical issues that could be solved through code writing. The conversation took place via email.
